EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #10a.2019 Dealer Update #10
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - March 25, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | March 2019
Laseref IV Promotional Pricing
- This sales bulletin provides special pricing for the installation of the Laseref IV to replace the Laseref II and Laseref III which are expected to be unrepairable in 2020. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-06 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-06%20Rev A Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
CMA 6800 LCD Display Upgrades
- Upgrade your display and take advantage of promotional pricing.
- Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-31 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-31%20CMA 6800 LCD Display Unit Upgrade.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
DU-1310 Display Upgrades
- Upgrade to the DU-1310-2 and take advantage of a trade-in credit for return of older models, and special offers for HAPP customers.
- Here is Honeywell NEXT Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019_N_17 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_17 DU-1310-2 Display Upgrade.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 NEXT bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
